title: How robots learn to handle the heat with synthetic data
description:
Thermal sensors and synthetic data can help train robots for a wider range of scenarios than traditional sensors alone, says Bifrost AI.

The post How robots learn to handle the heat with synthetic data appeared first on The Robot Report.
